jcr:content.jcr:description: The all-new Vanish Tempo is the newest edition to the Vanish speed family. Designed for speed and comfort, this running shoe is made for fast training and racing.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Vanish Tempo
jcr:content.pageTitle: The All-New Vanish Tempo—A Speed Shoe Made for Training and Racing. | Altra Running

customhtml2_909194541.customHTML:
Vanish Tempo

Vanish Carbon

Vanish Tempo

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE VANISH TEMPO

Introducing the Vanish Tempo — an all-new speed shoe designed for racing and fast training.

The Vanish Tempo defines speed in its own way while still sharing the same shoe geometry, midsole foam, and Slim Footshape™ fit as the Vanish Carbon.

image.alt: 2 Runners on Sidewalk in Vanish T

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
ROCKER ON.

Our rocker shape geometry is designed to give the feeling of being propelled forward with each step and provides an efficient toe-off without taking away from your natural stride.

customhtml2_copy.customHTML:
COMFORT MADE
FOR SPEED. This sibling offers a more snug, comfortable fit for fast training and racing. This shoe is equipped with added cushioning around the heel collar for enhanced comfort along with a supportive midfoot cage for a secure, locked-in fit.

image.alt: Vanish Tempo Features EGO Pro Midsole

customhtml2_copy_cop_229667436.customHTML:
ALTRA EGO™ PRO—
MADE TO GO.

Shared with our carbon-plated sibling, underfoot you'll find our lightest and most energy-efficient foam designed to cushion each stride mile after mile. This midsole foam is designed to offer the comfort you need for your fast training days as well as race day.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
FOOTSHAPE™
FIT
The Vanish Tempo features our Slim FootShape™ Fit, our most slim fitting option. This feature allows your toes to relax and sit naturally to give you the power and stability you need for your fast, long-distance run.
